definition: A practice or exercise that is typically performed to improve skills, knowledge, or proficiency in a particular area. It is commonly used in educational or training contexts to refer to activities aimed at enhancing abilities through repetition and application.

examples.german: Die Lehrerin gibt uns viele Übungen zum Lösen.
examples.english: The teacher gives us many exercises to solve.

examples.german: Er hat viel Übung im Klavierspielen.
examples.english: He has a lot of practice in playing the piano.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Übung für den Mathetest gemacht.
examples.english: She did an exercise for the math test.
